vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
NonStandardIERC20Token (IERC20Token.sol#14-20) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (IERC20Token.sol#17)
	-transferFrom (IERC20Token.sol#18)
	-approve (IERC20Token.sol#19)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in IERC20Token.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.4 (IERC20Token.sol#3): it allows old versions

errors: input files do not contain any valid contracts
